charges.charge_disposition: It is judgment of crt dft h/b comm 168 mos. Upon release placed on supv rel 3 yrs under terms and conditions 1) obey rules and regs of USPO and gen ord 318 2) participate in program as instructed and approved by PO for treatment of narcotic addiction and drug dependency which may incl counseling and testing to determine if dft has reverted to use of drugs. Pay restitution to Cal Fed Bank, North Hills, CA, $790.85. Pay S/A $50. Fines wvd, due to inability to pay (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:2113(a), 2 Aiding and Abetting a Bank Robbery (1)
